ocr_markdown:
### Section 1, Module 2: Reading and Writing

**Directions**  
As part of his I GOT UP series, Japanese conceptual artist On Kawara spent over a decade— with near daily consistency—mailing postcards to friends declaring what time he got up each day, resulting in pieces such as *I Got Up at 7:19 A.M., Jun 6 1977*. Such meticulous documentation of mundane artworks that “resonate with existential, psychological and scientific implications about the time-space continuum,” according to the *New York Times*, became Kawara’s life’s work.

---

**20 Mark for Review**  
Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?

A. information, has generated  
B. information generates  
C. information, generating  
D. information generated

questions.passage_text: As part of his I GOT UP series, Japanese conceptual artist On Kawara spent over a decade— with near daily consistency—mailing postcards to friends declaring what time he got up each day, resulting in pieces such as *I Got Up at 7:19 A.M., Jun 6 1977*. Such meticulous documentation of mundane artworks that “resonate with existential, psychological and scientific implications about the time-space continuum,” according to the *New York Times*, became Kawara’s life’s work.
questions.question_text: Which choice completes the text so that it conforms to the conventions of Standard English?
questions.explanation: This question tests grammatical structure and proper punctuation in sentence completion.
